features: ✔ PREMIUM BABY EYE CARE from Dr. Fischer brings to you the gentlest and most effective eyelid wipes that are absolutely free of preservatives, alcohol and other irritants. No more irritation of your baby's delicate eyes.

✔ TEAR FREE and RINSE FREE – Dr. Fischer Premium Baby Eyelid Wipes have been specially formulated with babies in mind. Clean away everyday dirt buildup around the eyes without crying or harmful chemicals and help alleviate clogged tear ducts and irritation.

✔ CONJUNCTIVITIS and CLOGGED TEAR DUCTS (along with pink eye, dry eye, styes & allergies) relief means easing eye irritation caused by these conditions is finally possible! Dr. Fischer Premium Baby Eyelid Wipes prevent the worsening of conditions, allowing your baby’s eyes to heal naturally.

✔ CLEANING YOUR BABY’S EYELASHES to get rid of oil, dirt, dust, crusted matter, ocular secretions, and other foreign bodies has never been easier. Just wipe & and clean with Dr. Fischer Premium Baby Eyelid Wipes.

✔ SAFE & EFFECTIVE FOR ALL AGE GROUPS - Dr. Fischer Premium Baby Eyelid Wipes have been recommended by Ophthalmologists, Pediatricians, and dermatologists for babies & and kids of all ages. Embrace the safety of your baby's eyes.
body.description: Why use Dr. Fischer Premium Baby Eyelid Wipes? Children often wake up in the morning with red/itchy eyes, and sticky residue, crusted matter & scales on their eyelids and eyelashes. This can cause discomfort, interfere with vision and invite redness and itching. In these situations they may naturally rub their eyes with unclean hands and worsen the condition. Dr. Fischer Baby Eyelid Wipes allow you to easily clean the area, preventing worsening conditions. A great deal of research & testing have gone into the development of these eyelid wipes, in order to ensure their safety and effectiveness. Leading Ophthalmologists, Dermatologists and Pediatricians have endorsed Dr. Fischer Premium Baby Eyelid Wipes for babies & kids of all age groups. Easy to Use Dr. Fischer Premium Baby Eyelid Wipes are easy to use and rinse free. Being free of preservatives, fillers and alcohol, they are especially formulated for babies, as they are tear free, rinse-free and gentle on your baby eyelids and eyelashes. Making sure they wont cry and do not suffer from further irritation of their eyes! Cleansing of the highest order A child's daily environment in nursery schools, daycare centers and playgrounds frequently expose their delicate eye surrounds to dust, dirt, and allergens as well as serious contagious eye conditions. With Dr. Fischer Premium Baby Eyelid Wipes you can clean your child's eyelids and eyelashes of these irritants while helping prevent ocular conditions from worsening and assist the eyes in healing naturally.You can use these medically or daily, in combination with other options like eye drops/eye ointments to give your eyes the best chance of clearnessSay NO to harsh eye cleansers & start using 100% SAFE, TEAR FREE & IRRITATION FREE, Dr. Fischer Premium Baby Eyelid Wipes!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: the wipe is very large so it can be used on both eyes and even the nose. it is not too wet but can moisturize the skin well and clean all the discharge gently.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good product, but does not help with clogged tear duct.
reviews.reviewText: Used this for my little one when he has been having issues with clogged tear duct. I didn’t see any magical improvement, however it did help to keep his eye clean without causing too much discomfort. They came very handy when we were going out to md visits and social meets ups.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: WOW Is what I have to say! Absolutely love this product. My newborns eyes would not get better and hot compress was not working. She would wake up with her eye shut and was desperate to try to help. Now like everyone else, you are scared to try thing on your newborn but these wipes are a must. I tried to cure her eyes for about 2 months like her pediatrician suggested but didn’t seem to work. Within 2 days of using these wipes, I saw a HUGE difference, I was mind blown. Her eye completely cleared and I still use it to clean her eye if there is any lint or fuss in there to clean it out. Will definitely recommend 1000%

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 6, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars NO MORE STEROIDS FOR BLEPHARITIS
reviews.reviewText: I have had blepharitis for nearly 30 years and have seen several opthamologists for treatment. All have prescribed steroids and/or antibiotic ointments like Tobradex that have already caused noticeable damage to my eyes - not surprising after 3 decades of use. Earlier this year I stumbled across these eyelid wipes on Amazon and thought I would give them a try. I have been using them for six months now and have been able to keep the blepharitis under control without using any medications. I prefer the BABY eyelid wipes to the 'adult' version because they have more texture that works better for clearing debris, and it just feels better to use. The only difference between the two is the saturation of the liquid solution on the wipe (says so on Dr Fischer website and it is very noticeable between the two wipes). Since it is more saturated the 'adult' version feels like it has less texture than the BABY version, and the excess solution runs into my eyes with the adult version (this doesn't sting or cause any irritation to my eyes, but I don't like it). I HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS PRODUCT FOR BLEPHARITIS SUFFERERS.

reviews.reviewText: Sometimes apart of this wipes for eyes there is no need for anything else . Cleaned my child eye. The only negative part (and is about all the eye wipes) being expensive and can be used only on one eye not to help spread it to the other eye. But that's normal and understandable for what it actually does
I’m Parent of 3 little kids, always using Fisher Eye care for my kids. It’s very handy on the go, also great for newborns when have yellow discharge from the eyes.
